title: Longhorns Daily News : New odds give Texas men basketball fourth - best chance for Big 12 regular season title
body_text:
BetOnline.ag released their latest lines yesterday. According to how the bettors figure it, the No. 10 Texas Longhorns men’s basketball squad currently has the fourth-best chance at taking home the Big 12 regular season title at +700.
Longhorns Daily News: New odds give Texas men’s basketball fourth-best chance for Big 12 regular season title
Plus: Texas men’s basketball versus Oklahoma State tonight
Texas’ last regular season title came in in the 2007-2009 season.
